summary: Elixirs that even the Gods themselves would want! .. pfft...uh...who am I kidding? not really lol, but they're still quite nice.
descriptionHtml:
This is the first mod I've uploaded to Nexus, but not the first I've made, I usually just make small tweaks and stuff :x

Anyway, I thought this would be a cool idea to share with people, so here it is!

Elixirs of the Divines!

They're pretty much the effects of the shrines, just with a shorter duration and portable.

Here's the items needed to craft it, and there's a note underneath about how to get the energies.

Akatosh – Magicka Regen +10% for 60 minutes (3600 seconds). Requires Energy of Akatosh and 2 Falmer Ears to make

Arkay – Fortify health +25 for 60 minutes. Requires Energy of Arkay and 3 Bonemeal to make

Dibella – Fortify Speechcraft +7 for 60 minutes. Requires Energy of Dibella, a Small Pearl and Dwarven Oil to make

Julianos – Fortify Magicka +25 for 60 minutes. Requires Energy of Julianos, Nirnroot and Dwarven Oil to make

Kynareth – Fortify Stamina +25 for 60 minutes. Requires Energy of Kynareth, Spriggan Sap and Taproot to make

Mara – Fortify Restoration +10% for 60 minutes. Requires Energy of Mara and 5 Wheat to make

Stendarr – Fortify Block +10% for 60 minutes. Requires Energy of Stendarr and 2 Chicken’s Eggs to make

Talos – Fortify Shout recovery +20% for 60 seconds. Requires Energy of Talos and 5 Dragon’s tongue to make

Zenithar – Fortify Barter +10% for 60 minutes. Requires Energy of Zenithar, a Pearl and Dwarven Oil to make

Elixir of the Eight – Magicka Regen +10%, Fortify health +25, Fortify Speechcraft +7, Fortify Magicka +25, Fortify Stamina +25, Fortify Restoration +10%, Fortify Block +10%, Fortify Barter +10% for 20 seconds + 3 poison damage per second over 20 seconds = 60 points of health damage. Requires 1 of each Divine Energy (Akatosh, Arkay, Dibella, etc.) minus Talos’ Energy, A Daedra Heart and 2 Dwarven Oil to make or an Alternate recipe that requires the same ingredients as above, however instead of a daedra heart, requires 2 common soul gems.

Elixir of the Nine – Magic Regen +10%, Fortify health +25, Fortify Speechcraft +7, Fortify Magicka +25, Fortify Stamina +25, Fortify Restoration +10%, Fortify Block +10%, Fortify Barter +10%, Fortify Shout recovery +20% for 20 seconds + 3 poison damage per second over 20 seconds = 60 points of health damage. Requires 1 of each Divine Energy (Akatosh, Arkay, Dibella, etc.), A Daedra Heart and 2 Dwarven Oil to make or an Alternate recipe that requires the same ingredients as above, however instead of a daedra heart, requires 2 common soul gems.

• To make the Divine Energies you must melt down an amulet of the respective Aedra (Amulet of Akatosh, Arkay, Dibella, etc.) at a smelter, along with 2 Dwarven metal ingots to contain the energy inside a Dwarven Centurion Dynamo-esque container.

• The Elixirs are made in the “Misc” Section of a cooking pot.

• When I tested it on my machine, there was a small bug with the way it displayed the buffs, it'd show a value of 0% instead of 10% for some elixirs, however I think the buff still works.
____________________________________________________________________________________________

I might make a Daedra version some other time
____________________________________________________________________________________________

To install, just unzip the "Elixirs of the Divines" file and drop the .esp into your Skyrim Data folder
